rows.label: bf08120100_0010
rows.name:
I don't think...
there's any meaning in knowing.

rows.label: bf08120100_0030
rows.name: The kagutsuchi in my memory...is not you.

rows.label: bf08120100_0040
rows.name: I can only think of you as a completely different Blade.

rows.label: bf08120100_0050
rows.name:
Makes sense.
I have nothing to say when you put it like that.

rows.label: bf08120100_0060
rows.name: But, I still need to know.

rows.label: bf08120100_0070
rows.name: I want to know what I did, what I really thought...

rows.label: bf08120100_0080
rows.name:
And... It seems wrong to just forget about the people
who were important to me before...

rows.label: bf08120100_0120
rows.name:
Really, Hana is only just born.
Doesn't know much!

rows.label: bf08120100_0130
rows.name:
But, even Hana knows, stories of
old Drivers very important!

rows.label: bf08120100_0160
rows.name:
Hana always thinks, "must make many
more Masterpon memories"!
